public abstract class Enemy
extends MovingSprite
Class representing an enemy sprite (many per level)

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy​(java.lang.String level, MovingSprite.Weapon weapon, int x, int y, int height, int width, Player targetEntity, float deltaHoriz, float deltaVert, int horizAgroTiles, int vertAgroTiles, float health, java.util.LinkedList<MovingSprite.DIRECTION> movePath)
      Create a new Enemy sprite (MovingSprite)
      Parameters:
      level - the level of sprite (dictates the path of the texture)
      weapon - the weapon the Enemy is carrying
      x - position of Tile (within tile grid) to place sprite
      y - position of Tile (within tile grid) to place sprite
      height - of Tiles to occupy
      width - of Tiles to occupy
      deltaHoriz - horizontal speed
      deltaVert - vertical speed

    • attack

      public void attack​(MovingSprite.Weapon weapon)
      Description copied from class: MovingSprite
      Attack the sprite; called when another sprite launches an attack within range of the sprite. Deducts -5 * hit multiplier of used weapon from sprite's health.
      Specified by:
      attack in class MovingSprite
      Parameters:
      weapon - the weapon the attacking sprite is currently carrying

    • move

      public boolean move​(float delta) throws TileMovementException
      Description copied from class: MovingSprite
      Method to handle general MovingSprite movement Attacks if boolean set and moves the sprite in direction of directionMoving Implementation notes: -> setNextDirection() abstract method defines path of MovingSprite -> Can be extended by overriding and calling super on this method -> When a sprite is moving, two Tiles are occupied. Moving to and moving from.
      Overrides:
      move in class MovingSprite
      Returns:
      True: Arrived at next tile ; False: Currently moving
      Throws:
      TileMovementException

    • destroy

      public void destroy()
      Destroy the Enemy & remove from the level. Called when the Enemy's health reaches 0 or less.
      Specified by:
      destroy in class MovingSprite
